function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Accelerated adoption of technology in brick-and-mortar and online retailing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indirect and direct impact of technology implementation on customer satisfaction and shopping experience.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The potential spread of contagious diseases through touch-based interfaces and remote human interaction technologies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact with actuator technology.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through mid-air tactile enabling technologies.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased mobile traffic during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of tactile input in webshop experience","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased reliance on visual and auditory stimuli","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical inspection and trial opportunities for products online","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived risks leading to online shopping abandonment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of product returns on retailers’ bottom line","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Virtual worlds and online shops with avatars could increase the risk of contagious diseases propagation due to the close interaction of people in virtual spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address the ’forgotten senses’ in online marketing could lead to suboptimal consumer information processing and a lack of differentiation in the cluttered online environment.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to physical proximity in virtual reality shopping experiences.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases through direct customer interactions via chatbots on social media platforms.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased social interaction during livestream commerce may lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of virtual conversational agents and avatars in e-commerce may create a false sense of security regarding disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of voice assistant technology in cooking apps may lead to cross-contamination of devices in the kitchen.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased social interaction in online shopping experiences","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of social distancing measures in online interaction","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher demand for online shopping leading to increased exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sensory input in online shopping preventing customers from getting a complete shopping experience.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Webshops not considered pleasant ’places’ to visit, leading to a lack of experiential value online.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical interaction with ar installations and shared smartphone usage can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced focus on hygiene and social distancing measures due to increased reliance on digital experiences.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty around consumer acceptance of technology-based innovations may lead to resistance and hesitancy in adopting new digital solutions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced sound levels may lead to uncomfortable ambiance","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Contamination risk from vr equipment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase of displayed covid-19 guidelines, warnings, and obligations in stores","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambient conditions of physical servicescape, including background music and noise levels","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission through physical contact with payment devices and surfaces in stores.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate space in stores can lead to crowded and congested environments, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of products in stores may lead to increased physical interactions and longer shopping durations, contributing to disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to contact with products in stores.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological reactance leading to anti-social behavior such as increased touching of products.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased waiting lines and congestion at store entrances due to limited capacity.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biometric surveillance measures , face recognition, gps tracking creating privacy concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health screening measures may be perceived as invading personal privacy","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of physical servicescape changes on customer experience cx due to pandemic challenges","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of voice assistants and social robots may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases by allowing interactions without physical contact.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virtual reality and holographic technology may create an illusion of physical presence, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for human-to-human contact during in-store shopping or pick-up","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to technology-mediated solutions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for sales and interactions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shoppers may feel on edge and try to keep a distance from other shoppers and employees.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long queues at the store entrance may increase fear of contamination and negative feelings.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased store crowding can lead to fear of contamination and decreased customer satisfaction.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impacts of covid-19 measures on utilitarian and hedonic shopping value","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of contamination causing barriers to visiting stores and using services","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to social distancing measures in shopping environments.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
